doctitle.textblock: Amendment to Withdrawal Application and Opportunity for Public Meeting, Nevada; Correction

action.textblock: The Notice of Amendment to Withdrawal Application and Opportunity for Public Meeting for N-37171 published in the
on September 21, 1992, pages 43468-9, is hereby corrected as follows:
1. On page 43469, in the first column, the first line, the ``NW1/4NW1/4,'' should be changed to read ``NW1/4NE1/4,''.
2. On page 43469, in the first column, the following legal description should be inserted on a new line just before Sec. 33: ``Sec. 28, W1/2;''.
